    • Uses of Linkable in org.ardulink.gui

      Classes in org.ardulink.gui that implement Linkable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AnalogPinStatus

      Ardulink

      v2.0.1 Phoenix

      This class implements the AnalogReadChangeListener interface and is able to listen events coming from arduino board about analog pin state change.
      class  ConnectionStatus

      Ardulink

      v2.0.1 Phoenix

      This component listens for connection or disconnection events showing the state of a Link in the GUI.
      class  DigitalPinStatus

      Ardulink

      v2.0.1 Phoenix

      This class implements the DigitalReadChangeListener interface and is able to listen events coming from arduino board about digital pin state change.
      class  KeyPressController

      Ardulink

      v2.0.1 Phoenix

      This class captures key press events and sends messages to arduino board with key press information.
      class  PWMController

      Ardulink

      v2.0.1 Phoenix

      This class can manage power with modulation arduino pins sending specific messages to the arduino board.
      class  RGBController

      Ardulink

      v2.0.1 Phoenix

      This class can manage three power with modulation arduino pins sending specific messages to the arduino board.
      class  SwitchController

      Ardulink

      v2.0.1 Phoenix

      This class can manage digital arduino pins sending specific messages to the arduino board.
      class  ToneController
